word_mean: ［拉 cultivatio］培养〔法〕：繁殖活有机体的方法，尤指在人工培养基中繁殖细胞

sentence.Network_en: Farmers with many acres under cultivation profited.
sentence.Network_cn: 耕种大片土地的农场主挣了钱。

sentence.Network_en: The cultivation in good taste is our main objective.
sentence.Network_cn: 培养高雅情趣是我们的主要目标.

sentence.Network_en: These high yields have been achieved largely through better methods of cultivation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样高的产量主要是通过改良耕作方法取得的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... cultivate v 耕作；培养 cultivation n 栽培；培养 culture n 文化.
养_百度百科 ... 养育〖 bringup〗 养殖〖 cultivation〗 养殖场〖 farm〗.
语言应该加以培育（cultivation）。布拉格学派这个培育的意思，如果翻译得神似，最好用我国语言学界所说的语文建设。
cultivation regulations on high - yield carrot production in yongchang county ., 永昌县胡萝卜丰产栽培技术规程.

话题作文集_夏日阳光_新浪博客 ... polite 有礼貌的 cultivated 有教养的 warm-hearted 热心的.
china-translation.com tu dien anh-hoa ... cultivation 培养，培育 cultivator 孵卵器 culture 培养，培养物.

entry.def: If you cultivate land or crops, you prepare land and grow crops on it.

example.ex: She also cultivated a small garden of her own.
example.tran: 她还耕种了一片属于自己的小园子。
为数不多的几小块耕地

entry.tran: 逐渐形成，培养(某种态度、形象或技能)
entry.def: If you cultivate an attitude, image, or skill, you try hard to develop it and make it stronger or better.

example.ex: He has written eight books and has cultivated the image of an elder statesman...
example.tran: 他已经写了8本书，树立起了其政界元老的形象。

example.ex: Cultivating a positive mental attitude towards yourself can reap tremendous benefits.
example.tran: 培养一种自信的积极心态会让人受益匪浅。

entry.def: If you cultivate someone or cultivate a friendship with them, you try hard to develop a friendship with them.

example.ex: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General...
example.tran: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

example.ex: Estonia has done much to cultivate the friendship of western European countries.
example.tran: 爱沙尼亚努力发展与西欧国家的友谊。

means.word_mean: 2. (agriculture) production of food by preparing the land to grow crops
3. a highly developed state of perfection; having a flawless or impeccable quality;

sentences.sentence: "I admired the exquisite refinement of his prose"
"almost an inspiration which gives to all work that finish which is almost art"--Joseph Conrad

stems_affixes.word_buile: arboriculture[[n.树木的培植]]男→adj.培植树木的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有开垦的, 没有耕种的, 没有教养的

stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向内+cult教派→在教派内不让别人知道
agri农业+culture培养,文化→引申为养殖业→农业
aqui水+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.[生物]水产养殖
arbori=arbor+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.树木的培植
cult耕种,培养→培养[感情]→崇拜,引申为教派
cultivate[v.耕作,栽培,养殖;培养,教养,磨炼]+ion动作或状态→n.耕作,培养

stems_affixes.value_cn: 文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育
stems_affixes.word_buile: cult耕种,培养+ure表名词→培养出的[东西]→人类文化
flori=flor花+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.花艺, 栽培花卉
pisci鱼+culture[n.文化,文明;修养;耕种;栽培,培育]→n.养鱼学, 养鱼业

sentences.en: This method of cultivation produces higher yield.
sentences.cn: 这种耕作方法可提高产量。

sentences.en: These high yields have been achieved largely through better methods of cultivation.
sentences.cn: 这样高的产量主要是通过改良耕作方法取得的。

sentences.en: He is interested in vegetable cultivation.
The cultivation in good taste is our main objective.
sentences.cn: 培养高雅情趣是我们的主要目标。

sentences.en: Mike is a man of charm and cultivation.
sentences.cn: 迈克是一个既有魅力又有教养的男子。
